body: @hithummah i don't know how you can look at this work here epecially page 4 when compared to Minna de Meromero ni Shiteageru and thinks this is enhanced. i mean look at her smile and face on page she looks retarded. i don't think loyalty and accuracy to the source is what to look for when reading a doujin considering they're all about what if scenarios.
Art styles evolve over time.  Usually for the better.  But then you get Ohtomo and Suna and you just ask yourself "What bad thing happened in their lives to produce this?"

@kopiuszeus well the art are loyal if there anything it gets enhanced. look at the height of Kirino and Ayase, they look what they supposed to; 165/166cm (yes they are mature for they're age). the anime make them look short.
there we go, this is better but still the thick thighs are gone why is he changing his artstyle for. it was perfect as is.
